mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1)/10 + 1) PAGE, ( SELECT MAX(FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1)/10 + 1)) FROM TB_MAIL_RESERVED WHERE IDX_MAIL_RESERVED >= #{tag} * 10 - 9) MAXVALUE FROM ( SELECT TB_MAIL_RESERVED.* FROM TB_MAIL_RESERVED WHERE IDX_MAIL_RESERVED >= #{tag} * 10 - 9 ORDER BY IDX_MAIL_RESERVED ASC ) A) WHERE PAGE = #{tag}
